Articles.Content:
Hello! My name is Jeremy and I\'m from Australia.

I downloaded the demo earlier this morning and within an hour I had the full version! I love this program, it\'s so addictive. 

Cheers!

Jez

Hi! Hope you have a good time playing!

Mynorus
Welcome to a fellow aussie! Get ready for many hours,days,weeks,months of of Kerbalism. Have a nice flight.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Mince

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks everyone! I\'ve actually been sick so my time getting better has been playing this game for the last 36hrs! I love it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Let me list the ways I love you :

You spell with correct grammar, despite being an Aussie.

You bought the game.

You posted a constructive greeting.

You posted in more than this forum in less then a day of your registering.

**Kisses and Koalas!** 

**-Arcane**
Welcome to the forums! I hope you\'ll enjoy it here. Happy Launches! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> Let me list the ways I love you :
> 
> You spell with correct grammar, despite being an Aussie.

HAHA Oh, I loved this! Thanks!
